title: Victrix's Premium Arcade Sticks Are Over 50% Off For A Limited Time

description:
Are you ready to solve the Sanctum Sigil Puzzles in Blue Prince? There are eight of these in the game, and they're all found in the same general area. However, the clues you need are scattered all over the estate. Our guide has all the solutions, but be forewarned that there will be spoilers ahead.

How to solve the Sanctum Sigil Puzzles in Blue Prince - Sigil Puzzles guide

The Sigil Puzzles are found in the Inner Sanctum of the Underground. You reach this area as part of general progression to arrive at Room 46. You're then asked to head down below so you can open the last lever for the Antechamber. That particular leve
title: How To Solve Sanctum Sigil Puzzles In Blue Prince
Disney Illusion Island PS5 And Xbox Preorders Are Live At Amazon For $30
Two Atari Retro Consoles Get Massive Price Cuts, Including New 7800+
Steeply Discounted Game Boy Encyclopedia Covers All 1,100-Plus Games

description:
Nintendo's long-awaited Switch 2 system finally arrives on June 5, and the company is ushering it in with two marquee titles. Just a few weeks after the console hits the market alongside Mario Kart World, Nintendo will release Donkey Kong Bananza, a brand-new adventure game starring the iconic, banana-loving ape.

Bananza marks the first full 3D Donkey Kong title in over 20 years, and it's a stunning showpiece for the new system, featuring impressive visuals and fully destructible environments that DK can pummel with his earth-shattering punches. Nintendo will undoubtedly share more details about the game in the weeks leading up to its launch, but in the meantime, here's a roundup of everything we know so far about Donkey Kong Bananza.

<
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Release Date, Trailer, Gameplay Details, And Everything We Know

description:
There are few gaming franchises more successful than Rockstar Games' Grand Theft Auto. The franchise has become a cultural phenomenon, and while few games can truly replicate the experience of pure GTA, there are plenty of games like GTA that can satisfy the desire to play something similar. Whether you enjoy the driving aspect of GTA, the heists, or the freedom, there are other games that offer a comparable experience.

Few games offer everything that GTA does, but every game on this list features a gameplay experience that matches something you might enjoy about one of the titles in the GTA series. However, most games on the list are similar to GTA in that they offe
title: 18 Best Games Like GTA To Play In 2025

description:
Woot’s Spring Video Game Sale is now live, offering steep discounts on all sorts of gaming hardware and accessories--plus a selection of Switch, PS5, and Xbox games--through April 30. Many products from premium brands like Razer, Turtle Beach, Logitech, and more are on sale at some of the lowest prices we’ve ever seen. The company is owned by Amazon, meaning Prime members benefit from free shipping, and you can shop with peace of mind knowing you’re buying from a trusted retailer.

<
title: Woot Spring Gaming Sale - Save On Controllers, Headsets, And Other Gaming Hardware

description: Batman Beyond: The Complete Animated Series is on sale for a low price right now. If you're in the mood to watch some classic Caped Crusaders cartoons, head over to Amazon and snag the Batman Beyond Blu-ray box set for only $25 while you can. The limited-time deal slashes $30 from the six-disc collection's original $55 price.
title: Batman Beyond Complete Series Blu-Ray Box Set Drops To $25 At Amazon

description:
Are you looking for the Sanctum Keys in Blue Prince? There are eight of these in total, and finding them is no small feat. You're bound to revisit the manor and other locations multiple times across several runs. Our guide discusses all of these details, but please be aware that there are major spoilers ahead.

Where to find all Sanctum Keys in Blue Prince - Sanctum Key locations guide

The Sanctum Keys are your next main objective in the campaign. Here's what you need to know:

  • As you approach the Antechamber and Room 46, you're told that you need to go down to the
title: All Sanctum Key Locations In Blue Prince

description:
So, you're looking for the Found Floorplans in Blue Prince? While most rooms in the game can be drafted by default--with a bit of luck and prayers to the RNG gods--there are other areas with blueprints that you must obtain first. Doing so adds them to your drafting pool, and they have a chance to appear when you draw rooms. In any case, please be forewarned that this article contains spoilers.

All Found Floorplans in Blue Prince - Floorplan locations guide

There are eight Found Floorplans that we've discovered so far. These include the Planetarium, Conservatory, Closed Exhibit, Mechanarium, Lost and Found, Treasure Trove, Tunnel, and Throne Room.

We've organized our guide so that we can focus on the blueprints that you ca
title: Where To Find All Floorplans In Blue Prince

description:
EA Sports hasn't even officially announced College Football 26, but now more details about the game have emerged from an unexpected source. The home improvement chain Lowe's has announced a collaboration with EA Sports to feature its branding in CFB 26, along with the newest EA Sports FC and Madden NFL titles.

Lowe's branding will appear in these games "across multiple gameplay experiences," the retailer said. For CFB 26, Lowe's branding will show up on the broadcast overlay for the Stadium Pulse feature. This feature aims to replicate the pressure of playing an away game by making certain gameplay elements more difficult for a short period of time. Lowe's said this draws "meaningful parallels to the passion homeowners feel when enhancing their own spaces with Lowe's."
title: The Latest CFB 26 News Is Not What You Expect

description:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is one of the best and most popular games ever made, so players naturally want to experience other games like it. While few games can match the brilliance of Skyrim, we have come up with a list of 26 titles that offer a great experience that should appeal to Elder Scrolls V fans.

These games feature some or all of the elements that make Skyrim such a terrific game. From the RPG aspects to the open-world exploration to the fantasy setting, you'll certainly find something for you in one of these games if you like what Skyrim has to offer. There are also games that take direct inspiration from Skyrim and offer a similar experience in terms of gameplay and narrative. As a note, this list is in no particular order and only features games that are still widely playable in 2025. If you'd rather just stick with Skyrim,
title: Best Games Like Skyrim To Play In 2025

description:
Yes, you can indeed destroy walls in Blue Prince. You'll probably notice these odd fixtures in certain rooms--it seems that the walls are weakened or about to collapse. The only way to see what's behind these barriers is by finding the right tool. Before we continue with our guide, please be reminded that we're going to mention some minor spoilers.

How to destroy walls in Blue Prince

You can destroy walls once you've found a Power Hammer. Compared to the reliable Sledge Hammer that can break open locked trunks/chests, the Power Hammer is a beefed up contraption that smashes through weakened brick walls.
title: How To Destroy Breakable Walls In Blue Prince

description:
So, you want to light torches and candles in Blue Prince? There are several locations in the game where you'll see these objects in the environment. At the back of your mind, you're thinking that you should be able to interact with them. Well, you certainly can. We're here to help you do just that, but please take note that this article contains minor spoilers.

How to light candles and torches in Blue Prince

There are a couple of items that allow you to light candles in the game. These are the Burning Glass and the Torch. And, of course, randomization does apply, so you're not always guaranteed to find these in your playthrough.

Note: You lose all the items you acquire when the day ends. That means you need to pray to the
title: How To Light Candles And Torches In Blue Prince

description:
Are you utterly perplexed by the Clock Tower Puzzle in Blue Prince? Don't worry because everyone else is. And, once you find out what you need to do, you'll probably have a good laugh because of all the frustrations you felt earlier.

How to solve the Clock Tower Puzzle in Blue Prince

The Clock Tower is a room that can only appear in the draft pool once you've activated its floorplan. This can be done once you have access to the Drafting Studio. In it, there's a board that lets you select from three randomized options. If you see the Clock Tower, go ahead and select it so it has a chance to show up whenever you're drawing rooms in the manor.


The Clock Tower clue that you should ignore... for now
title: How To Solve The Clock Tower Puzzle In Blue Prince

description:
Over the past two decades, Animal Crossing has become a flagship title for Nintendo, inspiring tons of games like Animal Crossing. The series is best known for its lovable animal villagers, peaceful daily chores, and tons of decorations to design not only a perfect home, but a perfect island. Fans of Animal Crossing really connect with the different villagers who can live in their town and the amount of customization you can do.

Animal Crossing exists with one foot in two different genres. It exists in the life-sim genre with games like The Sims, focused on relationships with NPCs and house decorations, while also existing in the management-sim genre, with your island needing to be maintained
title: Games Like Animal Crossing To Get Cozy With In 2025

description: Marvel Rivals Season 2 has kicked off, bringing new content to the 6v6 hero shooter, including the new Vanguard hero, Emma Frost. A powerful telepath and the leader of the Hellfire Trading Company, Emma Frost uses her powers to further the coexistence of mutants and regular people. In Marvel Rivals, Emma Frost is a powerful tank, who can use her Diamond Form to absorb damage from enemies, and abilities like her grapple to deal damage and keep her foes exactly where she wants them. Season 2 also sees the addition of free
title: Every Emma Frost Cosmetic In Marvel Rivals

description:
Earlier this year, The Witcher 3 actor William "Bill" Roberts, who played Vesemir, passed away. Developer CD Projekt Red has now released a special video paying tribute to the late actor.

"Today, we bid him a fond farewell. You taught us, you gave advice, you cared for us. Kaer Morhen will never be the same without you. Godspeed, dear old friend," CD Projekt said in a social media post. This was accompanied by a video of some memorable Vesemir moments from The Witcher 3, including the character's own death in the game and Geralt saying he died like a hero.

This year, we lost William 'Bill' Roberts, who portrayed Vesemir in The Witcher games. Today, we bid him a fond farewell.
You taught us, you gave advice, you cared for us. Kaer Morhen
title: Witcher Dev Pays Heartfelt Tribute To Vesemir Actor Who Recently Passed Away

description:
Are you planning to sail on the Reservoir boat in Blue Prince? While you might think that this is a quaint activity that leads to a bit of sightseeing, it's actually a fairly convoluted task that requires visiting multiple locations. Don't worry, since we've got you covered with all the details. Just watch out because this article contains a few spoilers.

How to sail on the Reservoir boat in Blue Prince

You can sail on the Reservoir boat by altering the water levels via the Pump Room. This is easier said than done because (a) you don't know what those water levels are, and (b) you still need to make changes in the Pump Room itself.

In any case, we've outlined our guide to mention the clues first, just in case you want to solve thin
title: How To Ride The Reservoir Boat In Blue Prince

description:
Baldur's Gate 3's months-in-the-making Patch 8 update is just around the corner, with developer Larian Studios officially revealing it will arrive April 15.

The update is a big one, adding 12 new subclasses (one for each class), cross-play between platforms, a photo mode, split-screen co-op for those playing on Xbox Series S (originally one of the reasons the game didn't come to Xbox at launch), and a number of smaller tweaks and bug fixes.

As de
title: Baldur's Gate 3's Massive Patch 8 Update Is Coming April 15 With 12 New Subclasses

description:
Do you want to drain the Fountain in Blue Prince? This fixture at the grounds of the manor might seem inconspicuous at first glance. But, as you'll soon find out, nothing in this game is placed in areas by accident. Everything has a purpose, and some might lead you to new discoveries. In any case, please be reminded that this article contains minor spoilers.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to drain the Fountain in Blue Prince

How to drain the Fountain in Blue Prince

You can drain the Fountain by making use of the Pump Room. In fact, the Pump Room is what you need to access if you want to fiddle around with areas--and even
title: How To Drain The Fountain In Blue Prince

description:
So, you want to drain the Reservoir in Blue Prince? This area is found in a massive cavern and, if it's your first time discovering it, you just know that something's down below. While you might already have an idea of what to do, things can get a bit complicated once you're back inside the manor. In any case, we want to remind you that this guide contains spoilers.

How to drain the Reservoir in Blue Prince

The Reservoir is a huge area found in the Underground. It's what separates the two halves--i.e. west (Fountain entrance) and east (Foundation entrance).

You can fully drain the Reservoir by using the controls in the Pump R
title: How To Drain The Reservoir In Blue Prince

description:
Are you pondering on how to remove the tunnel crates in Blue Prince? The tunnel just outside the manor is an odd location. From a distance, you see endless stacks of wooden boxes, and you just know that there's a path beyond. Thankfully, there's a fast method that clears out all obstacles. Oh, and before we continue, please be reminded that this article contains spoilers.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to remove the tunnel crates in Blue Prince

How to remove the tunnel crates in Blue Prince

You can remove the tunnel crates in Blue Prince by making use of certain experiments in the Laboratory. Here's a quick summary:

Legacy Of Kain: Soul Reaver Physical Editions Delayed, Deluxe Edition Preorders Available

description:
Do you want to get more Vault Keys in Blue Prince? Similar to other items in the game, these can appear randomly in your runs. Oh, and as a caveat, they also tend to be fairly rare. Our guide discusses the different methods to acquire them, though you might still need to pray to RNGesus for a bit of luck.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to get Vault Keys in Blue Prince - Deposit Box Keys guide
    • Vault Key locations

How to get Vault Keys in Blue Prince - Deposit Box Keys guide

The Vault appears rarely in runs and with good reason, since you can amass a whopping +40 gold just by grabbing coins in the a
title: How To Get Vault Keys In Blue Prince

description:
Are you wondering about how to get the Red Crown in the Closed Exhibit in Blue Prince? This particular room might seem imposing at first glance, especially since there's a security system that bars access. Still, there's a way to circumvent this system, allowing you to grab your reward.

How to get the Red Crown in the Closed Exhibit in Blue Prince

The Closed Exhibit is one of the game's Floorplans, which means it's not available by default. Instead, you need to obtain it by unlocking the
title: How To Get The Red Crown In The Closed Exhibit In Blue Prince

description:
Season 2 of Marvel Rivals has arrived, bringing the new Hellfire Gala season and the new Vanguard, Emma Frost. There are also new maps, team-ups, and cosmetics to earn, as well as a new battle pass. Marvel Rivals battle passes never expire, and include 10 skins, amongst other cosmetic rewards. This season includes multiple Hellfire Gala skins--with more presumably coming to the shop--along with some other skins, like the classic Retro X-Uniform skins for Psylocke and Magik. There are also some free Namor cosmetics available via Twitch Drops.

Marvel Rivals battle passes cost $10 for th
title: Marvel Rivals Battle Pass Season 2 - All Skins, Emotes, And Other Rewards

description:
Planning to solve the Mechanarium Puzzle in Blue Prince? The goal is to ensure that the last door can be accessed, and that can only be done if you place down the correct rooms all over the house. There's also a neat workaround in case you're having trouble with this task.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to complete the Mechanarium Puzzle in Blue Prince - Mechanarium Eight Doors guide

How to complete the Mechanarium Puzzle in Blue Prince - Mechanarium Eight Doors guide

The Mechanarium is a special room since it's not available by default. Instead, it comes from a Floorplan, which you can only obtain in
title: How To Solve The Mechanarium Puzzle In Blue Prince

description:
Do you want to get more Ivory Dice in Blue Prince? This item might be one of the most important resources in the game. It lets you redraw or reroll the three room options that appear. In doing so, you'll have more flexibility when it comes to pathing toward your goal, or generating a particular room you need.

How to get more redraws and Ivory Dice in Blue Prince - Redraw guide

By default, Ivory Dice, as well as a means of redrawing rooms, tend to be fairly hard to come by, and with good reason. You're supposed to select from the rooms available to you. Sure, you might not get what you want, which is why you have to adjust to the circumstances.

Still, the more redraws you have, the more your run becomes manageable. For instance, instead of getting the Da
title: How To Get More Ivory Dice And Redraws In Blue Prince

description:
So, you want to craft items in Blue Prince? The stuff you get by default have their uses, but the contraptions you create do have functions that are integral to progression and exploration. Our guide discusses what this feature entails, the tools that you can make, and the best ones to consider.

How to craft items in Blue Prince - Workshop guide

You can craft items via the Workshop, which appears somewhat infrequently during runs. The good news is that it usually has one unique item on the table, and you can interact with the workbench to start creating your own gizmos.

Workshop crafting combinations

To craft items in Blue Prince, you need to have the required tools for each mechanism. Here are the ones that we've discovered so far:

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: How To Craft Items In Blue Prince

description:
Elden Ring: Tarnished Edition and Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition seem like they could be the most technically ambitious games coming to Nintendo Switch 2. But neither surprised Digital Foundry as much as Ubisoft's Star Wars Outlaws--an open-world title that is current-gen only and never arrived on PS4 and Xbox One.

Digital Foundry technology editor Richard Leadbetter opened up the discussion about Star Wars Outlaws on Switch 2 on this week's DF Direct podcast (seen below). "I think this one's quite surprising, to be honest, Star Wars Outlaws," said Leadbetter. "This is
title: Switch 2 Getting Star Wars Outlaws "Is Pretty Mind-Blowing," Says Digital Foundry

description:
Prime Video's upcoming Tomb Raider TV series from Fleabag's Phoebe Waller-Bridge is reportedly "dead." That's according to sources speaking to Daily Mail, which said scripts for the series were taking a long time to come together and were deemed not ready for filming.

Game of Thrones star Sophie Turner was reportedly the top choice to play Lara Croft in the series, but she may no longer be involved, the report said. Prime Video declined to comment when approached by Daily Mail.

The Tomb Raider series for Prime Video was greenlit under the leadership of Amazon MGM Studios boss Jennifer Salke, but Salke recently exited the company
title: Tomb Raider TV Series Reportedly "Dead"

description:
Papergames has revealed that Infinity Nikki will launch on Steam on April 29, and that it has surpassed 200,000 wishlists on the platform.

To celebrate the release, all players will receive 10 Resonite Crystals and three Energy Crystals, as well as a live wallpaper and some concept art. They will be sent to the in-game mailbox after Infinity Nikki releases on Steam.
title: Infinity Nikki Launches On Steam In April With Free Rewards

description:
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition does not include the content from the Wii U and Switch original's expansion pass.

Nintendo confirmed this with GameSpot in a statement, saying, "The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition does not include The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Expansion Pass DLC. That DLC is available as a separate purchase." The news was first discovered by Reddit user raptormelonsite (via Nintendo Soup) , who got word from My Nintendo Store UK's support team.
title: Zelda: Breath Of The Wild's $70 Switch 2 Release Does Not Include DLC

description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is whipping its way onto PS5 on April 17--or April 15 as an early access bonus for Premium and Collector's Edition preorders--and several of the new features for the game on Sony's platform have been revealed. That includes the PS5 Pro features that will distinguish it from other console versions, including Xbox.

Starting in the controller department, the DualSense's haptic feedback and adaptive triggers have been tied to several parts of the game, including combat, exploration, and using Indy's tools. Bethesda added (via the PS Blog) that the controller's lightbar is connected to game actions, with some examples being the LED light pulsing yello
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle Is Getting Some Impressive PS5 Pro Enhancements

description:
Since A Minecraft Movie was released in theaters, there have been plenty of videos emerging from screenings showing moviegoers yelling, screaming, throwing popcorn, and even bringing a live chicken with them. In at least one case, the police were called to kick out rowdy teens amid reports of vandalism. Director Jared Hess has now reacted to the... passionate response from viewers.

Speaking to EW, Hess said, "It's weird when you're having too much fun and the cops get called."

The director went on to say "it's just literally cheering and
title: A Minecraft Movie Director Responds To Cops Being Called To Showings Of The Movie

description:
What games should you play on Xbox Game Pass?


With so many options to choose from, narrowing down the best Xbox Game Pass games currently available can be a challenge. The subscription service has grown in size, offering a massive library of big AAA games, new day-one releases, and even overlooked gems--early 2025 Game of the Year contender Blue Prince is now on the service, having launched on day one. The library is so expansive that you're almost guaranteed to find at least a few games you'll love.

To help you navigate the ever-shifting landscape, we've rounded up the very best Game Pass games available now. There are plenty more excellent games on Xbox Game Pass than the ones we’ve listed below--the service is load
title: The Best Xbox Game Pass Games In 2025
Get This Great $100 PC Controller With Six Remappable Buttons For Only $30

description:
It was late 2020 when Universal Studios Japan first let guests inside its Super Mario World area of the park, with rides and a slew of minigames based on the Super Mario franchise. Unlike most theme-park experiences, this one was about collecting coins and stamps, competing against fellow visitors, and aiming to top the leaderboard. A pared-down version opened at Universal Studios Hollywood in 2023, cementing the idea that Universal was continuing forward with the gamification of its theme parks. In May, the company's newest theme park, Universal Epic Universe, will unveil its own Super Nintendo World--complete with a Donkey Kong Country section.

GameSpot was recently given the chance to tour Epic's new Super Nintendo World and, of course, to play in it. While those who have visited Hollywo
title: Super Nintendo World's Donkey Kong Country Brings Pure Joy To Epic Universe

description:
Developer Triband has partnered with Innersloth once again to create a new crossover for What the Car that brings the Among Us crew to the game. The free update, called Car-Mong Us, is available now on Apple Arcade and Steam.

The What the Car patch brings a new overworld to the game, which is inspired by the Skeld. For those unfamiliar, that's the iconic spaceship from Among Us. Additionally, there are new skins for the car based on the Among Us crewmembers: think red, blue, yellow, and green. The update also introduces four new minigames and three new courses to race on.
title: Among Us Crew Have Have Arrived In What The Car For New Crossover

description:
It's been almost 10 years since beloved indie platformer SpeedRunners was released, and now publisher TinyBuild has revealed a sequel set to revive the classic formula. SpeedRunners 2: King of Speed is coming to PC via Steam this year, with a console release following in 2026.

Sometimes called the "Mario Kart of 2D platformers," SpeedRunners saw players racing through lovingly crafted 2D platformer levels, running, jumping, climbing, and sliding their way to victory and collecting power-ups to gain the upper hand. SpeedRunners 2 will return to the same formula, though this time will support up to 8 players per lobby.
title: SpeedRunners 2: King Of Speed Announced For 2025 Release

description:
A number of Path of Exile 2's promised balance changes have gone live, after a recent update that has been incredibly unpopular with fans. The update saw PoE2's recent reviews on Steam dip into the dreaded "mostly negative" category, and the devs have been quick to address issues raised by fans. You can see the latest batch of patch notes below.

First and foremost in the latest patch, which is live now, are a number of nerfs to speedy monsters to prevent players from feeling overwhelmed. The changes have been applied individually based on monster behaviors--some monsters have had annoying abilities removed, some will now only walk instead of running until the player moves a certain distance away from them, while in some cases the number of monsters in an area has been decreased.
title: Path Of Exile 2 Patch Notes: Monster Nerfs Arrive After Much-Disliked Updated

description:
Like most sought-after devices, there has been some concern that the Switch 2 could end up in the crosshairs of scalpers ahead of its launch in June. While some people are already attempting to sell the console at a higher price on sites like eBay, Nintendo fans are stepping in to report these listings en masse.

On the Nintendo Switch 2 subreddit (as spotted by GamesRadar), there are numerous posts detailing the war on scalpers. Currently, eBay's rules state that an item may not be sold unless it can be shipped out within 40 days, and at the time of writing, 55 days remain between now and the Switch 2 launch
title: Fed Up With Switch 2 Scalpers, Nintendo Fans Are Fighting Back

description:
Game Pass Ultimate subscribers got some big news, as it was confirmed that both The Alters and Rematch are coming to the service at launch, both arriving in June.

The Alters, an ambitious survival game, hits Game Pass on June 13, with Sifu developer Sloclap's soccer game Rematch debuts on Game Pass on June 19. It's also coming to PS5 and PC.

</
title: Game Pass Gets Another Day-One New Release With 5v5 Soccer Game Rematch This June

description:
Schedule 1, the Steam game about building a drug empire, has become a breakout hit since it launched a little over two weeks ago, and now it's getting its first major update. The content update adds new functional stores, decor items, cosmetic items, and more. You can see the full patch notes for update 0.3.4. below.

The update adds a full interior and store functionality to Bleuballs Boutique, and does the same for the Pawn Shop, where you can sell almost anything (except drugs) to Mick. As well as the new stores, the update adds wall decor, which includes signs, lamps, collectable paintings, and more.

The new update also adds liquor, with names like Ol' Man Jimmy's Whiskey, Chateau La Peepee, and Brut du Gloop. The developer notes that liquor is purely decorative for the ti
title: Schedule 1 Patch Notes For Its First Content Update

description:
In 2022, solo developer Daniel Stubbington released the Portal-like puzzle game The Entropy Centre through his Stubby Games label. Now, Stubbington has announced that his next game, Void Breaker, is entering an open test right now. And judging from the announcement trailer below, this is one great-looking first-person shooter.

The trailer begins on an ominous note by mentioning that machines will only follow "the rules we set--until they learn to set their own." According to the game's description, th
title: Great-Looking New FPS Void Breaker Just Started An Open Test On Steam

description:
This week's Triple- Initiative covered a wide range of genres, but for anyone looking for a retro-inspired platformer, then Duskfade was likely the star of the show for them. Currently in development at Weird Beluga Studio, Duskfade is set in a world that has become enshrouded in an eternal night. As Zirian, a young workshop apprentice, players will set out to restore time itself in this "clockpunk" world, which the studio describes as a love letter to action-platformer classics of the past.

<
title: Duskfade Looks Like The Jak And Daxter Spiritual Successor You've Been Waiting For
